text:
Install jwsdp-1.2 in C:\Program Files under windows.

Try running the test scripts.  They fail beacuse it converts the space to %20.

I get the same result with the ant that came with jwspd 1.2

BUILD FAILED
file:c:/Program%20Files/jwsdp-1.2/tutorial/examples/jaxrpc/common/targets.xml:4:
taskdef c
lass org.apache.catalina.ant.DeployTask cannot be found

WORKAROUND: If I move the targets.xml file to c:/common/targets.xml then it
works no problem.

I guess you can't include a file that has a space in the filename or else it
will get gacked up.

I have tested this with :

entity.xml

<?xml version="1.0"?>
<!DOCTYPE project [
    <!ENTITY common SYSTEM "C:/Program%20Files/common.xml">
]>
<project name="test" default="test" basedir=".">
  <target name="setup">
    <echo message="we are in setup"/>
  </target>
  &common;
</project>

common.xml under C:/Program Files/

<target name="test" depends="setup">
<echo message="we are in common.xml"/>
</target>



This works for me using ant1.6alpha.

This works also using ant1.5.3.1, however with a warning message saying :
C:\Program%20Files\common.xml could not be found

Whether I use %20 or a space does not make a difference in both cases.

Is it possible that you have an old version of xerces.jar in your CLASSPATH ?

Try to unset your CLASSPATH and rerun your build to see if it goes better.

Antoine
creator: antoine@apache.org

text:
I have not tried 1.6, only 1.5.x.  

I get the warning too, but it still seems to find the targets.xml file.  At
first this seemed like it was the problem as once I moved the targets file to
C:\targets.xml (or someplace with no spcae in the path name) things started to work.

It turns out that these are bugs in the jwsdp-1.2 download.  They install things
in jaxrpc\bin then the scripts refer to jaxrpc-1.0.3.  There are other bugs. 
I'm closing this and opening a bug for jwsdp-1.2.
